Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations and productivity. Given its value to you, I understand it might be worth $8,000 to you. Considering the high quality and unique features of this product, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a dedicated support package to ensure smooth integration into your business processes. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your organization further. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
